definitions: the action of designing or producing something to meet someone's individual requirements

examples.text: the goal of search personalization is to help the searcher save time
3D printing allows for advanced personalization of implants
it worked fine again, except all my personalizations were gone

shortDefinitions: action of designing something to meet individual requirements

definitions: the action of making something identifiable as belonging to a particular person, especially by marking it with their name or initials

examples.text: the lunch sacks are machine-washable and are perfect for personalization

shortDefinitions: action of making something identifiable as belonging to particular person

definitions: the action of causing an issue, argument, etc. to become concerned with personalities or feelings rather than with general or abstract matters

examples.text: he was a victim of the personalization of politics

shortDefinitions: action of causing issue to become concerned with personalities

definitions: the attribution of a personal nature or human characteristics to something, especially a deity or spirit

examples.text: the personalization of gods developed gradually

shortDefinitions: attribution of human characteristics to deity or spirit
